Original question:
A survey vessel has a 10 ft diameter, B 5-90 propeller with a pitch of 10 ft. The propeller speed is 200 rpm,
the boat speed is 20 knots, and the thrust reduction factor (t) is 0.12, wake fraction (w) is 0.18, and the relative
rotational efficiency ηR is 1.0. The propeller operates as indicated by the Wageningen (Troost) Series B propeller charts. Determine
d. The propeller shaft power (delivered power) PD
